Class WOWZDeviceUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices.WOWZDeviceUtils

  • public class WOWZDeviceUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    The WOWZDeviceUtils class contains a set of device-related utility classes.

    • Method Detail

      • getDeviceOrientation

        public static int getDeviceOrientation(android.content.Context context)
        Gets the current orientation of the device.
        Parameters:
        context - The application context.
        Returns:
        WOWZMediaConfig.ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE or WOWZMediaConfig.ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT.

      • getDeviceRotation

        public static int getDeviceRotation(android.content.Context context)
        Gets the rotation, in degrees, of the device, with 0 being the natural landscape orientation and 90 being the natural portrait orientation. 180 and 270 are the inverted landscape and portrait orientations, respectively.
        Parameters:
        context - The application context.
        Returns:
        The rotation, in degrees, of the device.

      • getSurfaceRotation

        public static int getSurfaceRotation(android.content.Context context)
        Deprecated. Use getDeviceRotation(Context) instead.
